column5: I've booked a trip in Feb for a week at Memories resort on Grand Bahamas island. I've done some Googleing to find out about fishing and found there is a flat to the east of the resort that DIY'ers can wade for Bonefish.  Looking for any feedback on experiences, guides, must do's and must do nots for while I'm there.  Thanks
Do NOT go near any camp fires Matt.......  Just saying....
Do NOT go near any camp fires Matt.......  Just saying.... Sheese....a guy lights himself on fire once and never hears the end of it ....lol
